title: The Journeyman Barber
aka: The Journeyman Barber, Hairdresser and Cosmetologist
The Journeyman Barber, Hairdresser, Cosmetologist and Proprietor
additional-notes: The only active contribution renewals for this periodical are listed in the Artwork section of the Catalog of Copyright Entries, and not in the Contributions to Periodicals section.

This magazine's first actively renewed contribution is in an issue titled 'The Journeyman Barber, Hairdresser and Cosmetologist'. See the Online Books Page listings for more on this serial's title history.
